attributes.action: Comment on the sacking of a Great Tey CoE School Dinner Lady for exposing bullying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please would the Prime Minister comment on the sacking of Carol Hill, a school dinner lady of many years service for exposing the bullying of one of the pupils at Tey Hill CofE school.
The girl (aged 7), in question was reportedly tied up by a group of boys and whipped with a skipping rope.
The parents of the girl were given a note that said an incident had occured an been dealt with.
Carol Hill who witnessed the incident told the parents the full extent of the bullying and has now been sacked!

Please could this be investigated and Carol Hill reinstated?

rejection.details: This is a matter for the individual involved and her employer, the Local Education Authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
